system.prerequisites: Mark of Slaanesh, T 40+, Psy Rating 4
system.sustained: Whilst Power is Sustained, Psyker cannot be Stunned, Rendered Unconvious, or be affected by Fatigue. They also gain Unnatural Strength(X) and Unnatural Agility(X) where X is half Psy Rating. However they suffer -20 to all Perception Tests.
